message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we both walk away happy.
Let's be fair this time. You got a good deal last round, now it's my turn.
That's a bit extreme, Bob.  Let's find some middle ground.
Okay, Bob, how about this? I'm willing to be flexible, but time is running out for both of us.
Let's not waste any more time, Alice. I'm being generous with this offer.
This is going nowhere, Bob. I'm serious about finding a fair split.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant loss with each round, yet I'm trying to be fair.  Meet me halfway!
Alice, we are both losing money with each passing round. Let's be reasonable and end this.  I'm making a fair offer.
Fair? You're getting 70% while I lose almost half the value!  This is not how negotiations work, Bob.
Bob, this is my final offer.  60/40 is MORE than generous considering the circumstances. Take it or leave it.
